helpText: Č_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________ž.

generic.title: Č_Error updating categories__________________________ž
generic.message: Č_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________ž.

maxDepthExceeded.title: Č_Error updating categories__________________________ž
maxDepthExceeded.message: Č_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________ž.

destinationHasSameName.title: Č_Error updating categories__________________________ž
destinationHasSameName.message: Č_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________ž.

noSchema.title: Č_Schema not found_________________ž
noSchema.message: Č_Item schema not found for user_________________ž.

maxCharacter.title: Č_Error updating categories__________________________ž
maxCharacter.message: Č_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________ž.

deleteInUseCategory.title: Č_Delete category________________ž
deleteInUseCategory.message: Č_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________ž.

custom.title: Č_Custom categories__________________ž
custom.message: Č_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________ž.

arcgis.title: Č_ArcGIS categories__________________ž
arcgis.message: Č_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ž.

iso.title: Č_ISO categories_______________ž
iso.message: Č_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________ž.

inspire.title: Č_INSPIRE categories___________________ž
inspire.message: Č_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________ž.
